text: Rocco Anthony Petrone (March 31, 1926 - August 24, 2006) was an American mechanical engineer, U.S. Army officer and NASA official. He was director of launch operations at NASA's Kennedy Space Center (KSC) from 1966 to 1969. He was third director of NASA's Marshall Space Flight Center from 1973 to 1974. He retired from NASA in 1975. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Engineers from New York (state) Category:Scientists from New York (state)
title: Rocco Petrone
